name: Pong Life
description:
My first game. It consists in a pong game with the next features

  • 1 or 2 players on local
  • Paddle avatar system
  • Ball avatar system (3D and 2D)
  • Enable or disable powerups
  • From 2 to 6 players mode (most of them controlled by the machine)

In the future I will correct some small bugs, change some gameplay features to make it a little funner, and add online.
